div.p: A child element of setComponent that can be used to provide identification and access to a linked resource.

componentEntry is used within setComponent to provide a textual note about the alternative authority record that is being bundled together with others describing the same entity. The bundled alternative records for a given EAC-CPF entity may be in different languages or come from different authority systems. The bundling allows them to be transmitted or stored together. The componentEntry element provides a place where a particular alternative record can be described or explained in relation to the other authority records.

div.egXML: <alternativeSet> <egXML xml:lang="eng"><![CDATA[<alternativeSet> <setComponent href="https://adb.anu.edu.au/biography/mawson-sir-douglas-7531" linkTitle="Biography - Sir Douglas Mawson - Australian Dictionary of Biography"> <componentEntry> Australian Dictionary of Biography record. </componentEntry> </setComponent> <setComponent href="http://nla.gov.au/anbd.aut-an35335937" linkTitle="Mawson, Douglas, Sir, 1882-1958 - Full record view - Libraries Australia Search"> <componentEntry> Libraries Australia record. </componentEntry> </setComponent> <setComponent href="https://www.eoas.info/biogs/P000631b.htm" linkTitle="Mawson, Douglas - Biographical entry - Encyclopedia of Australian Science"> <componentEntry> Encyclopedia of Australian Science record. </componentEntry> </setComponent> </alternativeSet>
